## Experimental.RangeOf.format() method

Formats this range using the supplied format function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
format(format: (value: T) => string | undefined, formats?: RangeOfFormats): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  format | (value: T) =&gt; string \| undefined | Format function used to format minimum and maximum extent values. |
|  formats | [RangeOfFormats](./ts-utils.experimental.rangeofformats.md) | _(Optional)_ The [format strings](./ts-utils.experimental.rangeofformats.md) used to format the range (default [Experimental.DEFAULT\_RANGEOF\_FORMATS](./ts-utils.experimental.default_rangeof_formats.md)<!-- -->). |

**Returns:**

string \| undefined

Returns a formatted representation of this range.
